title: The Skin of the Wolf - Bajo la piel de lobo [2017 - Spain] drama
description: The Skin of the Wolf [2017 - Spain] Bajo la piel de lobo Drama starring . . . . Mario Casas, Irene Escolar, Ruth Díaz https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6347150/ Bearded, bulky and brutish, Martinón lives in utter solitude in a stone house high on a mountainside. His existence consists of eating, sleeping and hunting. On his annual visit to the nearest village to sell his pelts, barman Severino tells Martinón that he should get a dog, or if he doesn't want a dog, then he should get himself a wife.
